00016 /// Provides the Thread classs.

00018 #ifndef __THREAD_HPP
00019 #define __THREAD_HPP
00020 
00021 #include <types.hpp>
00022 #include <data.hpp>
00023 
00024 /// A thread.
00025 /**
00026  * The 'main function' of each thread is stored in the Machine::globals list of the machine.
00027  * The first thread corresponds to the last global, the second thread to the second last global, and so on.
00028  * 
00029  * A thread can be triggered and activated. It is called 'pending' when it is either triggered, activated or both.
00030  * The Machine::run() starts the execution of the next pending Thread, Round-robin style.
00031  */
00032 class Thread {
00033     
00034     public:
00035         /// An index in the Machine::threads list.
00036         typedef Int8 Id;
00037         
00038     protected:
00039         bool is_triggered;
00040         bool is_active;
00041         
00042     public:
00043         /// Trigger this thread.
00044         /**
00045          * The specified thread will be executed once.
00046          * 
00047          * There is no waiting line. Triggering an already triggered thread has no effect.
00048          */
00049         void trigger() {
00050             is_triggered = true;
00051         }
00052         
00053         /// Activate this thread.
00054         /**
00055          * The specified thread will be executed infinitely, until deactivation.
00056          */
00057         void activate() {
00058             is_active = true;
00059         }
00060         
00061         /// Deactivate this thread.
00062         /*
00063          * The selected thread will stop executing infinitely.
00064          * 
00065          * This has no effect for any pending triggers.
00066          */
00067         void deactivate() {
00068             is_active = false;
00069         }
00070         
00071         /// Check whether this thread is pending (true) or not (false).
00072         bool pending() const {
00073             return is_active || is_triggered;
00074         }
00075         
00076         /// The result of the last execution of this thread.
00077         Data result;
00078         
00079     protected:
00080         /// Remove a pending trigger.
00081         void untrigger() {
00082             is_triggered = false;
00083         }
00084         
00085         friend class Machine;
00086         
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif
